name: deviantTHUMBS:TINY v7 (rotane)
description:
Like style 71699, but it also makes the thumbs small again. 

NOTE: Film deviation thumbs are not sliding properly. Not going to be a quick fix though...

Page on deviantART: http://fav.me/d5ci8ic

user.name: rotane
user.about: I like to write userstyles. Some of them i upload here, the majority of which are for deviantART.com

additional_info:
Version history:
  • Version 0.1 (August 25, 2012) Public release.
  • Version 0.1-1 (August 25, 2012) Lit and film thumbs bugfixes.
  • Version 0.2 (August 26, 2012) [Renamed from deviantTINYTHUMBS] Lit thumbs bugfixes again. (Did dA change something?)
  • Version 0.3 (September 1, 2012) Support for deviations in storage, mature content thumbs; bugfixes.
  • Version 0.4 (September 7, 2012) Bugfix for updated dA-code.
  • Version 0.4-1 (September 7, 2012) Brings back lit tag.
  • Version 0.4-2 (September 7, 2012) Bugfix for Grid and Wall views, and panorama thumbs.
  • Version 0.4-3 (September 7, 2012) Bugfix for panorama thumbs. (This is getting tiresome, dA!)
  • Version 0.4-4 (September 14, 2012) Bugfix for collection/gallery thumbs.
  • Version 0.5 (October 23, 2012) Bugfix for group galleries' "more" link; small bugfix to lit/journal thumbs.
  • Version 0.5-1 (March 16, 2013) Bugfix for group galleries' main pages.
  • Version 0.6 (May 17, 2013) Better way of dealing with shadow-overflow of book-ends.
  • Version 0.7 (August 13, 2013) Bugfix for some MLT pages.
  • Version 0.7-1 (December 13, 2013) Bugfix for long deviation titles.
  • Version 0.7-2 (June 24, 2014) Removed Mozilla-specific values.
  • Version 0.8 (June 3 2016) Preliminary support for new thumbs grid.
